name: Super Mario Murder Mystery
description:
NINTENDO DON'T TAKE THIS DOWN BECAUSE IF YOU DO YOU ARE SCARED OF """ART"""

This is an RPG Maker game about Mario and pals stumbling upon a weird tower that puts them into dangerous situations! The game features:

  • A few minutes to finish the story (half an hour max.) but many, many alternate routes
  • An entirely vaporwave soundtrack (stolen)
  • All your fav Mario characters as well as an OC made by my best friend
  • A lot of points where you are gonna die because you made the wrong choice (choices matter blah blah)
  • A not very fun game
  • One (1) fight in the entire game

And not much else
